articles.description: In tonight’s episode, “Taboo,” Rebecca addresses issues with her mother in one time period, her feelings about Miguel in another, and her health in the present; Weight issues plague Kate in the past and present.
articles.content: In less than a week, Daylight Savings regions will spring forward. But tonight, This is Us took viewers back to early winter for its fifth and final Thanksgiving-themed episode. The episode reinstate… [+9515 chars]
